summary: A husband finds out that his wife and her lover are trying to kill him.
cast: Tim Matheson|Jennifer Jason Leigh|William Atherton|Hoyt Axton|Jay Gerber|Wayne Grace|Donald Hotton|Brian Libby|Peg Shirley|David Youse|Milt Hamerman|Michael Keep|Jan Merlin|James Scally|Dale Swann|Dale Morris|John R. Woodward
title: Enterrado vivo
